caseStudy.heading: Growing Onchain Communities with Bonfire and Livepeer
caseStudy.about: Bonfire lets creators design unique digital spaces to share exclusive content, host drops, and engage directly with their biggest fans.
caseStudy.problem: A lack of control created by hosting third-party video content posed a serious issue. The Bonfire team needed to upgrade its platform so it could host content natively.
caseStudy.solution: By leveraging Livepeer's comprehensive open video API Bonfire was able to seamlessly integrate native platform video streaming.

testimonial.name: Matt Alston
